issue.title: Cleanup obsolete rules or dead sites in JapaneseFilter
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

The following domains are inaccessible, sold, return a 403 error, or redirect to other domains. 
I accessed these domains using Chrome version 124.0.6367.91 on Windows 11, 23H2, with the UA left at its default (Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36)


### Proposed solution

For cosmetic rules, it's possible to delete the rule. For basic rules, I am not certain. 


### Additional information

On some websites, there was a notice indicating that they are currently under maintenance. 
However, given that the dates mentioned do not match the present, it's possible these sites have been left in maintenance mode.

comment.body:
> I accessed these domains using Chrome

That is not a very reliable way. For example, `2-d.jp` is living `https://yutorize.2-d.jp/ytsheet/sw2.5/`. You can use https://publicwww.com/ and Google search (check exact search `"2-d.jp"` and `site: 2-d.jp`).

comment.body:
> @liwenhao1992 Please select `et.tanx.com` and press Block button in the filtering log. Or add to user rules: `||et.tanx.com^`
> 
> Separately, please test blocking of selected domains one by one (disable test1 rule before add text2 etc.)
> 
> ![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/327561085-2cb87dcf-fa4c-4c00-a569-93fb28d8ec34.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..0ALGcc8J-GXpdqcsx5sxHOc9qIQTIOFG6ERGkasjDp0)

很神奇的是，在我禁止后，当重新展现广告时，过滤日志里依然能显示出那个被禁止的域，过滤对该软件不起作用
![Screenshot_20240503_114508](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/168742183/1e2ddf47-45d8-46c1-a190-5ff18b8fbef0)

comment.body:
Maik Lischke
Holteistr. 19a
10245 Berlin

> Am 02.05.2024 um 12:12 schrieb Alex ***@***.***>:
> 
> 
> Cannot reproduce
> 
> Details
>  <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/8361299/394faee5-cdbe-4a0c-b4d6-13dc0364b1f6>
> Which filter causes it?
> 
> —
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/177460#issuecomment-2090091104>, or unsubscribe <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/BBHZHBBYRFP2ASGGZVTNLKLZAIGPLAVCNFSM6AAAAABGP4YY42VHI2DSMVQWIX3LMV43OSLTON2WKQ3PNVWWK3TUHMZDAOJQGA4TCMJQGQ>.
> You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
> 
Good morning, 

yesterday I deactivated all the filters one by one. It is the Adguard basic filter. If I deactivate it, it works again.

Best regards
Maik

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://play.tv2.dk/afspil/6a7d0eae-e4e4-4444-a1a6-b88c8655f5e1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.tv2.dk%2Fafspil%2F6a7d0eae-e4e4-4444-a1a6-b88c8655f5e1) ### Comment > Even though I have disabled on the page it is detected and I can't see the broadcast > I have AdGuardHome on our network and all other devices work without problems. > > I've tried resetting it didn't work. Username: `@ClausHansn` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/myjvozrno2888o0csogswcsw0w8gwg8fwl6ryj0g60.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.14.0.1592 release System version: | M1 macos sonoma 14.4.1 Browser: | Firefox License type: | paid Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/mac_v2/filters/15.txt` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Language-specific:
Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters Userscripts: | AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js) Other extensions used: | AdGuardHome on network

comment.body: unfortunately no difference with all filters disconnected

issue.title: docs.yandex.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://docs.yandex.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.yandex.ru%2F) ### Comment > При включенном Фильтре отслеживания по URL Антитрекинга в web-приложении Яндекс.Документы при создании любого текстового документа, таблицы происходит переход на Яндекс.Диск с бесконечным запросом создания нового документа. При отключении этого параметра создание документа происходит штатно и без ошибок. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/707tpiajn9sssgw8o8gkgs4s80g4scwheqa0p0vc3w.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/clde0sbfi5sskgggwg40wkwc0w4ck043vmecesw1ka.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.3.46 System version: | Windows 11 Pro 23H2 Browser: | Яндекс Браузер Stealth mode options: | Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Block trackers Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard URL Tracking
